mapper.select: select sigle, book_id, label, codeisbn, author_id, editor_id, publicationdate, format_id, url, language_id, image_id from public.book where book_id = 1;

select book_label, isbn_label, author_label, sigle_label, program_label from recherche_par_titre_view -- change for title where unaccent(LOWER(book_label)) like ('%' || unaccent(LOWER( #{title} )) || '%') order by book_label desc;

select book_label, isbn_label, author_label, sigle_label, program_label from recherche_par_ISBN_view where isbn_label = #{isbn} --where unaccent(LOWER(isbn_label)) like ('%' || unaccent(LOWER( #{isbn} )) || '%') order by isbn_label desc;

select book_label, isbn_label, author_label, sigle_label, program_label from recherche_par_sigle_view where unaccent(LOWER(sigle_label)) like ('%' || unaccent(LOWER( #{sigle} )) || '%') order by sigle_label desc;

select book_label, isbn_label, author_label, sigle_label, program_label from recherche_par_programme_view where unaccent(LOWER(program_label)) like ('%' || unaccent(LOWER( #{program} )) || '%') order by program_label desc;

select book_label, isbn_label, author_label, sigle_label, program_label from recherche_par_ap_view where unaccent(LOWER(ap_label)) like ('%' || unaccent(LOWER( #{topic} )) || '%') order by ap_label desc;

select book_label, isbn_label, author_label, sigle_label, program_label from recherche_par_autheur_view where unaccent(LOWER(author_label)) like ('%' || unaccent(LOWER( #{author} )) || '%') order by author_label desc;

select book_label, isbn_label, author_label, sigle_label, program_label from recherche_par_langue_view where unaccent(LOWER(language_label)) like ('%' || unaccent(LOWER( #{language} )) || '%') order by language_label desc;
